title: (x) Lenny Zeltser logo - Platelet, ITC Conduit {Dav, Yves}
author: stephen_k

comments.content:
David, you seriously gotta lay off the drugs, man. :^D

The logo is [Conor Mangat](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Conor%20Mangat)’s gorgeous car plate-inspired monospaced [Platelet](http://web.archive.org/web/20070323023635/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=E.8014.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=LeNNY+zeLTSeR&sampleSize=48). The baseline looks like ITC Conduit. Lemmecheck…
Argh! Foiled by the ID Übermeister! :^/

I was right about [ITC Conduit](http://web.archive.org/web/20070323023635/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.100316.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=16&sampleText=I+N+F+O+R+M+A+T+I+O+N+++S+E+C+U+R+I+T+Y+++I+N+++B+U+S+I+N+E+S+S&sampleSize=16). Medium even.
